sentences.sContent: That uncertain thing was swelled bigger.
sentences.sCn: 那个不知叫什么的东西膨胀得更大了。

sentences.sContent: Their ship fell astern of the bigger one.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their ship fell astern of the bigger one.
sentences.sCn: 他们的船落到了一条更大的船的后面。

sentences.sContent: He hypoed his jeep's power by changing a bigger engine.
sentences.sContent_eng: He hypoed his jeep's power by changing a bigger engine.
sentences.sCn: 他为他的吉普车换了一个更大的发动机以增大其马力。
